p: In summary, the single crystal of Rb 3Na(H 2C 3N 3O 3) 4·3H 2O was obtained with the hydrothermal method in a short synthesis period. The calculated birefringence of Rb 3Na(H 2C 3N 3O 3) 4·3H 2O is about 0.368, its ultraviolet (UV) cutoff edge is down to 230 nm, the SHG intensity is about 0.2 × KDP, and phase matchable. We believe that this work could contribute to the development of the cyanurates and hydro-isocyanurates.
